clip.quote: If you help them and say, hey, look, this is super interesting. This is happening in our market nine times out of 10. They're going to call you back.
clip.why_clipworthy: It provides a specific tactic for getting media exposure and building credibility.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to get quoted in the media? Here's a simple tactic that works.

clip.quote: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go as a team.
clip.why_clipworthy: This quote encapsulates the importance of teamwork in achieving long-term success.
clip.suggested_hook: Why teamwork is essential for long-term success in real estate.
